Bali Island Tours

A gentle ocean breeze or the perfect escape from the bustle of the city

4,9

Route:Nusa Da and Ubud city

Tour dates:whole year

INDIVIDUAL TOUR, 5 * hotels
The secret of the "island of the gods" Bali can be defined as a successful synthesis of the best tourist parameters: developed infrastructure, unusual culture and religion, friendliness and openness of local residents, exoticism, natural beauty of its various corners, excellent hotel facilities and the highest level of service.

tour program
10 days 3000 $ UBUD

Around Bali: jungle, hidden beaches, ancient temples

4,7

Route:Nusa Dua, Ubud, Candidasa

Tour dates:whole year

INDIVIDUAL TOUR, 3-4 * hotels
Want to see the island different from everyone else? To look into the house of a real Balinese, cook with him a traditional dinner and offerings to the gods? See the black and hidden beaches of the island, dive with a mask or scuba diving, be touched by tiny deer and wild boars? Learn the concept of Shaivism, understand the canons of creating a Balinese temple and join the mystical culture of the island? And look into the ominous "village of the dead" inside the crater of the volcano? Then this tour is for you!

tour program
10 days 2800 $ BALI
